data.message: shame you didn't stick with the glass - those 100 billion PLASTIC bottles you make every year are choking up our oceans. Do you have a plan to deal with this or do you just not care?

replies.message: It's a good idea because there is an unlimited supply of sand to make glass, and empty bottles can be sterilised and reused. If Coca Cola revived the discount for used glass bottles, customers would have a good reason to return their bottles rather than dumping them in the street
